Articles.Content:
I've changed the file so it doesn't check for ksp version anymore. It seems to work now with 1.02, in that you can change the isp values of engines.

I wouldn't turn the "Thrust varies with ISP" setting on though. I think the patch changed/removed a value, so I don't think it'll work (I kinda macgyver'd it).

You can get the dll *removed* if you're interested.

If ferram4 doesn't want it up, I'll remove the link.

Edited June 6, 2015 by teal'c
I'm afraid you'll have to anyway, as pure-dll downloads aren't allowed, you need the license in the zip.

Alright, wasn't aware.

Here's the zip.

When did Chu'lak get an internet connection?

Thanks though!

Excuse me Teal'C, about that zip you provided for kerbal sip difficulty scaler, I tried it with kip version 1.0.2 and the scaler is not working but the menu shows up. Do you know if anyone is working on a developmental release yet? Thank you for taking your time to reading this.
I would also be interested in an update to 1.0.4 if you have the time. This was recommended in the Real Solar System forum for those that don't want to use Realism Overhaul.
Is this mod dead? Are you still maintaining it or not? :/
It's GPL, and thus anyone can maintain it.
there is an version of this mod for 1.04?
Not yet unfortunately. However, since Kerbal sip Difficulty Scaler is GPL, anyone including you can maintain it and update it so others don't have to.

Not yet unfortunately. However, since Kerbal sip Difficulty Scaler is GPL, anyone including you can maintain it and update it so others don't have to.

Also, with the change to Isp in 1.0, much of the motivation is gone - atmo and vac Isps do actually work correctly.

Also, with the change to Isp in 1.0, much of the motivation is gone - atmo and vac Isps do actually work correctly.

I agree with the point of atmo and vac ISP's, but I miss making my rockets guzzle fuel like no tomorrow. That way I actually have an incentive to build a really huge rocket.

TBH, I really miss this mod...

Edited July 17, 2015 by FiiZzioN

I also miss using this mod to use my existing rockets under RSS without having to start all over just to simulate the large scale of planets and physics. Now I have to go realism overhaul just to enjoy RSS.

Alright' date=' wasn't aware.

Here's the zip.

This kids fix for 1.0.4 work but it produce overheat , is there a solution ?

Meanwhile i just alt+f12 and turn off overheat ( but heat bar remain ).

You can turn of the tempter gauges by pressing F10. However, I wish there was some sort of work around or fix coming soon for KIDS. I am getting sick and tired of having to start over and build rockets that protrude the VAB and require complete overhauls just to use RSS. I just want something simple and fast.

- - - Updated - - -

You can turn of the temperature gauges by pressing F10. However, I wish there was some sort of work around or fix coming soon for KIDS. I am getting sick and tired of having to start over and build rockets that protrude the VAB and require complete overhauls just to use RSS. I just want something simple and fast.

You can turn of the tempter gauges by pressing F10. However, I wish there was some sort of work around or fix coming soon for KIDS. I am getting sick and tired of having to start over and build rockets that protrude the VAB and require complete overhauls just to use RSS. I just want something simple and fast.

I know right? I won't be able to use KSP with RSS until someone either makes a stock part rebalance that does not change any sizes, or until this mod is updated.
I'm like you, install RO is heavy. Kids was easy to use. plus, RVE still not compatible with 1.0.4 i'm stuck in 0.90.

Me too. I tried using KIDS but in version 1.0.4, the heating system is different now and things do not work the same way anymore, which pretty much renders KIDS broken. Even if I use the version that has the fixed DLLs, all of my rockets and planes spontaneously combust the instant I ignite their engines or do anything. I can disable the overheating by pressing Alt-F12 and selecting overheat off, but it is not the same and the used up consumables I want burned up will just not burn because of that setting. It just does not feel right. I know this plugin is considered GPL, but can someone please try to make a pitch effort to bring it back alive?
I made a small program to multiply isp in all .cfg files (in-game it weight zero compare to ro): https://www.dropbox.com/s/9kn3f9125r...ditor.rar?dl=0

I made a small program to multiply isp in all .cfg files (in-game it weight zero compare to ro): https://www.dropbox.com/s/9kn3f9125r...ditor.rar?dl=0

Link results in 404
sry: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9kn3f9125rhkmva/kspispeditor.rar?dl=0
Does this program work on a Mac? I tried it and nothing has happened yet. Can you provide an OS X version please?
Look at the thread title. Does it say 1.0.4?
No it isn't.
Then unless for some reason you are still using KSP 0.90 yourself, you have your answer as to why it doesn't work.
